document.full_text: pot-growing trailer known as the "growbot" was stolen from a medical marijuana trade show in denver over the weekend, and the owner on tuesday offered a $5,000 reward for its return.
document.title: pot-growing trailer stolen from denver trade show
lines_and_colors: pot-growing trailer known as the "growbot" was stolen from a medical marijuana trade show in denver over the weekend, and the owner on tuesday offered a $5,000 reward for its return.
